Plot: Ryden Malby graduates from college and is forced to move back into her childhood home with her eccentric family, while she attempts to find a job, the right guy, and just a hint of where her life is headed.
Title: Post Grad
Actors: Alexis Bledel, Zach Gilford, Michael Keaton, Jane Lynch
tomatoConsensus: A lightweight, unambitious comedy, Post Grad features fine actors that can do little with its middling, uninspiring script.
